extendedInfo.description: CareCheck helps patients, family members and friends track healthcare for major medical conditions and life events. It uses simple checklists with possible care actions to track a patient's progress through their care.CareCheck can help patients understand the care they are about to receive before receiving it. CareCheck can also help patients identify care actions they might want to discuss with a healthcare provider or others. CareCheck can even help patients recall the care they received months or years after receiving it.CareCheck is easy to use. Just select a medical condition or life event, choose a stage of care and follow the checklist through the care actions. A secure report with all checklist activity can be sent by email at any time. Reports include full details of a patient's care as tracked with CareCheck.APP FEATURESâ Uses checklists to track healthcareâ 4x interaction modes: Condition, Stage, Track, Reportâ Keeps a Care Timeline of all care receivedâ Sends secure reports by email anytimeCONDITIONS COVEREDâ Breast Cancerâ Heart Attackâ Lung Cancerâ Pregnancy & Birth

reviews.title: Please add
reviews.comment: FIBROMYALGIA and other chronic pain disorders. Your app is awesome. I have worked in the medical field gor over 13 years, i am also a chronic pain patient.  There is not much out there. Your app could help family members and patients alike.  The potential.
reviews.author: Debby Langdon

reviews.comment: Please add Multiple Sclerosis. It is one of the world\'s leading diseases and this app would be very helpful with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wife in 3rd trimester of pregnancy. Carecheck only app that lets us know what to expect at docs and track actual care received. Totally indispensable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is this the only app I found that lets me understand heart attack care from a dotor\'s point of view. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Enough
reviews.comment: It only covers two conditions and pregnancy. Please need multiple sclerosis, hiatus hernia, Gastroparesis when expanding the list
reviews.author: A Google User
